articles.author: Deutsche Welle
articles.title: DR Congo: EU, France condemn attacks on embassies - DW (English)
articles.description: France has led European Union condemnation of attacks on embassies in Kinshasa. Germany said it had canceled planned consultations with Rwanda over alleged support for the M23 rebels, whose advance sparked the violence.
articles.content:
The European Union on Tuesday condemned the attacks on foreign embassies in the Democratic Republic of Congo.
A spokesman for the EU's foreign affairs chief Kaja Kallas said in Brussels that the blo… [+2925 chars]

articles.author: Šejla Ahmatović
articles.title: Serbia’s PM Vučević steps down over mega student-led protests - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: “In order not to further raise tensions in society, I made this decision,” says departing leader as pressure grows on President Aleksandar Vučić.
articles.content: In order not to further raise tensions in society, I made this decision, Vuevi said, adding that he discussed the matter with Vui, who has been grappling with rising pressure from protests in recent … [+842 chars]
